data.text:
New Features for VCell 7.6

VCell Features

Single Sign On browser-based login for the VCell Desktop application and the new VCell web portal.

New VCell web portal enables user account management.

New ImageJ plugin for analyzing large spatial simulation results without downloading the entire dataset (via N5 data format).

The model annotation tool now integrates search for terms across several biomedical repositories via the BioPortal API.

New Export Viewer organizes recently exported simulation data.

Model interoperability

Improved import and export of SBML with round-trip validation of equations and cross-validation with COPASI and Tellurium.

Improved import and export of SEDML/COMBINE archives of complete BioModels with export of reaction diagrams, simulation results and publication citations.

Improved support for SBML Spatial import and export.

Infrastructure

Cross platform builds of VCell solvers ported to Github CI/CD.

Secure user identity provided by Auth0.com via OpenID Connect.

modern API technology based on Quarkus/OpenAPI and Java 17.

VCell services ported from Docker Swarm to Kubernetes.

New highly available on-premise RKE2 Kubernetes cluster.

Use PostgreSQL for development and tests, tested Oracle data migration. Production database updated from Oracle 11g to 19c.

Maintain Java, Python and Typescript API libraries for secure access to VCell API services.
